transcripts.text: Are you allowing all media in, sir?  Are you allowing all media in, sir?  Sir, are you allowing all media in?

The tyranny in Leon Valley seems to be never ending.  Newly obtained secret emails reveal just how far Police Chief Joe Savaggio will go to silence critics and escape accountability.  Leon Valley police arrested and beat up an out-of-town journalist outside of the city council chambers.  John Gray was there to report about the city council meeting and provide public testimony.

No, that's all right.  Thanks.  Sir, we're not over yet.  What the?  No.  Get out of the way.  How come you're letting that media in, but not me?  Get your hands off me!  Get your hands off me!  I have not rejected you.  I have not rejected you.  Get your hands off me.  Put it back.  Why is that media allowed in, but not me?  You're under arrest for obstruction.  For what?  You obstructed me.  I thought you were letting me in.  No, sir.  I'm back pushing you.  I'm not touching you, but I'm not pushing you.  Hey, you're breaking my stuff.
Get your hands off me.  John was later transported.
